import React from 'react' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import {addBabysitter} from '../actions/addBabysitter' import {addSlot} from '../actions/addSlot' import SlotInput from './SlotInput' class BabysitterInput extends React.Component { state = { first_name: '', last_name: '', phone_number: '', day_of_week: '', time_of_day: '' } handleOnChange = event => { this.setState({ [event.target.name]: event.target.value }) } handleOnSubmit = event => { event.preventDefault() this.props.addBabysitter(this.state) this.props.addSlot(this.state, babysitter.id) this.setState({ first_name: '', last_name: '', phone_number: '', day_of_week: '', time_of_day: '' }) this.props.history.push(`/babysitters/`) } render() { return(








) } } export default connect(null, {addBabysitter, addSlot})(BabysitterInput) // doesnt need anything from the store, only add new to store
